name: Click the tree
description:
Hi everyone! I'm happy to announce that my videogame is finally complete and ready to be released! However, I need your help to make it a success. The game was created with passion and dedication, but without your support, I won't be able to bring it to the world.

If you are passionate about video games and would like to support my work, please consider making a donation. Every contribution, even the smallest, will be greatly appreciated and will help me promote the game and get it into the hands of many players.

I looking forward to share this gaming experience with you and to continue creating new titles in the future, thanks to your support!game data is saved in your device so your data will never be lost,that way you can play other times.
